'''Thistlewool''' is a family of the [[Men of Bree]].<ref>{{FR|Sign}}</ref><ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 153</ref>
==Other versions of the legendarium==
The name is spelled "Thistlewoo'''d'''"<ref>{{HM|Guide}}</ref> in some editions.
